articles.description: According to a source, LaVine has downplayed the level of discomfort he’s gone through this season with the left knee, and will have surgery immediately following the playoff run.
articles.content:
Before the leagues health and safety protocols tapped Zach LaVine out of Game 5 of the first-round playoff series, the Bulls guard was walking a fine line when discussing his left knee issues.

articles.title: Peyton Manning establishes Demaryius Thomas scholarship endowment at Georgia Tech - NBC Sports
